1.title: Pilot
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: The underbelly of the horrific sex trade industry and the slaves hunters attempting to end the tragedy. The team of veteran slave hunter James Varghese of the Indian Rescue Mission attempts to rescue underage sex slaves from one of the planet's most dangerous brothels. We will follow James and his team on their seven day operation as they gather the intelligence needed to successfully rescue slaves from their bondage.
imdb.title: Slave Hunter
plot: The underbelly of the horrific sex trade industry and the slaves hunters attempting to end the tragedy. The team of veteran slave hunter James Varghese of the Indian Rescue Mission attempts to rescue underage sex slaves from one of the planet's most dangerous brothels. We will follow James and his team on their seven day operation as they gather the intelligence needed to successfully rescue slaves from their bondage.::Halogen TV
